title: Failed to connect to the chat + Hextech Crafting
body: While the other tabs work, only the 2 (in the title stated) failed to load and connect.

replies.body: There were some server issues happening during this period, but everything should be fine now.  Stay up to date on any issues like this through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Let me know if you still have any issues!
There was a response to the fix moments after I reported this, and it was fixed 2 hours after the response. Thank you for the fix!
